query: chi personalized items
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
WHERE
    -- Match CHI venue variants
    LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%chi%' 
    AND
    -- Match "personalized" / "personalisation" etc. in title or abstract
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%personalized%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%personalised%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%personalization%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%personalisation%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%personalized%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%personalised%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%personalization%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%personalisation%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%personal%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%personal%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC
LIMIT 100

query: yujia qin acl conference computer science improving entity for pre trained learning
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa
    ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a
    ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match author
    a.name ILIKE '%yujia qin%'
    -- Prefer ACL-related conference/journal venues
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%ACL%'          -- ACL, NAACL, EACL, EMNLP, etc.
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%Association for Computational Linguistics%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computational linguistics%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%NLP%'
    )
    -- Match topic keywords in title or abstract
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%entity%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%entity%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%pre-train%'    -- pre-trained / pretraining / pre-trained
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%pre-train%'
    )
    AND (
        p.title ILIKE '%improv%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%improv%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC
LIMIT 50

query: for information computer science acl annual meeting 2018
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
WHERE
    p.year = 2018
    AND (
        -- Match ACL Annual Meeting in venue
        p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%association for computational linguistics%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%annual meeting of the association for computational linguistics%'
        -- Fallback: match query terms in title/abstract
        OR (p.title ILIKE '%information%' AND p.title ILIKE '%computer%' AND p.title ILIKE '%science%')
        OR (p.abstract ILIKE '%information%' AND p.abstract ILIKE '%computer%' AND p.abstract ILIKE '%science%')
    )
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.title

query: acm sigchi conference on human factors in computing systems alexander j fiannaca uis for augmentative communication
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name
FROM Papers p
JOIN PaperAuthors pa ON pa.paper_id = p.paper_id
JOIN Authors a ON a.author_id = pa.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match venue (ACM CHI)
    (
        LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%acm sigchi conference on human factors in computing systems%'
        OR LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%chi conference on human factors in computing systems%'
        OR LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%chi%'
    )
    AND
    -- Match author name (Alexander J Fiannaca)
    LOWER(a.name) LIKE '%alexander%fiannaca%'
    AND
    -- Match topic keywords in title or abstract (UIs for augmentative communication)
    (
        LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%augmentative communication%'
        OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%augmentative communication%'
        OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%augmentative and alternative communication%'
        OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%augmentative and alternative communication%'
        OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%aac%'
        OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%aac%'
        OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%user interface%'
        OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%user interface%'
        OR LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%ui%'
        OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%ui%'
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: computer science 2016 an incremental emnlp conference
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
WHERE
    -- Year filter
    p.year = 2016
    AND
    -- Venue filter: EMNLP conference (allow variants like 'EMNLP 2016', 'Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing', etc.)
    (
        LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%emnlp%'
        OR LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%empirical methods in natural language processing%'
    )
    AND
    -- Text relevance filter: match "incremental" and "computer science" in title or abstract
    (
        (
            LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%incremental%'
            OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%incremental%'
        )
        AND
        (
            LOWER(p.title) LIKE '%computer science%'
            OR LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE '%computer science%'
        )
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: 2020 exploration virtual devamardeep hayatpur
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    array_agg(a.name ORDER BY pa.author_position) AS authors
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    p.year = 2020
    AND (
        -- match words from the query in title or abstract
        p.title ILIKE '%exploration%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%exploration%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%virtual%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%virtual%'
    )
    OR (
        -- match possible author names from the query
        a.name ILIKE '%devamardeep%' OR
        a.name ILIKE '%hayatpur%'
    )
GROUP BY
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: zihan liu acl slot 2020 computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url,
    a.name AS author_name,
    pa.author_position
FROM Papers AS p
JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa
    ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
JOIN Authors AS a
    ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- author name match (case-insensitive, allows middle initials, etc.)
    a.name ILIKE '%zihan%liu%'
    OR a.name ILIKE '%liu%zihan%'
    OR a.name ILIKE 'zihan liu'
    OR a.name ILIKE 'liu, zihan'
    
    -- venue / conference hint: ACL
    OR p.venue ILIKE '%acl%'
    
    -- year hint: 2020
    OR p.year = 2020
    
    -- topic keywords: "slot" and "computer science" in title or abstract
    OR (
        (p.title ILIKE '%slot%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%slot%')
        AND (p.title ILIKE '%computer science%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%computer science%')

query: acustico tap detection and localization using wrist based tdoa 2020 user interface software and technology computer science
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
WHERE
    -- Match key phrases/words from the researcher's query
    (
        -- core topic phrase (allowing for minor spelling variation via ILIKE)
        p.title ILIKE '%acustic%tap detection%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%acustic%tap detection%' OR

        -- tap detection & localization
        (p.title ILIKE '%tap detection%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%tap detection%') OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%localization%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%localization%') OR

        -- wrist-based / wearable context
        (p.title ILIKE '%wrist%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%wrist%') OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%wearable%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%wearable%') OR

        -- TDOA
        (p.title ILIKE '%tdoa%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%tdoa%') OR

        -- user interface / HCI
        (p.title ILIKE '%user interface%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%user interface%') OR
        (p.title ILIKE '%human-computer interaction%' OR p.abstract ILIKE '%human-computer interaction%') OR

        -- software and technology / computer science
        (p.venue ILIKE '%user interface%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%UIST%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%CHI%') OR
        (p.venue ILIKE '%software%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%technology%' OR p.venue ILIKE '%computer science%')
    )
    -- Year filter around 2020 (inclusive)
    AND p.year BETWEEN 2019 AND 2021
ORDER BY

    -- Likely EMNLP venue in 2020
    p.year = 2020
    AND (
        LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%emnlp%'          -- EMNLP main / findings
        OR LOWER(p.venue) LIKE '%empirical methods in natural language processing%'
    )
    -- Match query terms in title or abstract
    AND (
        (p.title IS NOT NULL AND LOWER(p.title) LIKE ANY (ARRAY[
            '%constrained%',
            '%fact verification%',
            '%fever%',
            '%computer science%'
        ]))
        OR
        (p.abstract IS NOT NULL AND LOWER(p.abstract) LIKE ANY (ARRAY[
            '%constrained%',
            '%fact verification%',
            '%fever%',
            '%computer science%'
        ]))
    )
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC
LIMIT 50

        OR p.title ILIKE '%pre training%'

ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST

query: learning transferable feature representations using neural networks 2019 computer science h bhatt acl
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    a.name AS author_name
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa
    ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a
    ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- Match title/abstract to the research topic
    (
        p.title ILIKE '%learning transferable feature representations%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%learning transferable feature representations%'
        OR p.title ILIKE '%transferable feature%'
        OR p.abstract ILIKE '%transferable feature%'
    )
    -- Likely field / venue hint: ACL (conference)
    AND (
        p.venue ILIKE '%ACL%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%Association for Computational Linguistics%'
        OR p.venue ILIKE '%computational linguistics%'
    )
    -- Year constraint
    AND p.year = 2019
    -- Author hint: "h bhatt" (match flexibly on name)
    AND a.name ILIKE '%bhatt%'
ORDER BY
    p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    p.year DESC

query: koren lazar emnlp filling gaps akkadian a masked computer science 2021
sql:
SELECT
    p.paper_id,
    p.title,
    p.abstract,
    p.venue,
    p.year,
    p.citation_count,
    p.open_access_url
FROM Papers AS p
LEFT JOIN PaperAuthors AS pa ON p.paper_id = pa.paper_id
LEFT JOIN Authors AS a ON pa.author_id = a.author_id
WHERE
    -- match author name (e.g., "Koren Lazar")
    (a.name ILIKE '%koren%' OR a.name ILIKE '%lazar%')
    AND p.venue ILIKE '%emnlp%'          -- EMNLP venue
    AND p.year = 2021                    -- year 2021
    AND (
        -- title/abstract keywords
        p.title ILIKE '%filling%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%gaps%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%akkadian%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%masked%' OR
        p.title ILIKE '%computer science%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%filling%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%gaps%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%akkadian%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%masked%' OR
        p.abstract ILIKE '%computer science%'
    )
ORDER BY p.citation_count DESC NULLS LAST, p.year DESC
LIMIT 50
